abstract: Analysts see potential buyout candidates, but only one surges on news of the deal.
snippet: Analysts see potential buyout candidates, but only one surges on news of the deal.
lead_paragraph: The specialty chemicals business might not seem to be a great candidate for a wave of consolidation right now. The jittery rise in prices for its main ingredient, crude oil, is but one reason.

headline.main: Will Buffett Deal Create a Chemical Reaction?
